recommended_degree: Desain Komunikasi Visual, Desain Grafis, Desain Media (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
1. Memabnatu editing video (Premiere Pro/Final Cut Pro/Davinci Resolve)
2. Membantu editing photo (Adobe Photoshop)
3. Membantu desain (Adobe Illustrator/CorelDraw) 
4. Membantu proses konten (planner, copywriting)
5. Membantu mengoperasikan Kamera DSLR/Mirrorless
